actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To prohibit the Office of Federal Detention Trustee from constructing Federal detention centers and to prohibit the Department of Justice from siting a detention center or Federal prison in Maryland, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits: (1) the Office of Federal Detention Trustee of the Department of Justice from expending any funds for the construction of, or the solicitation of construction proposals for, any Federal detention center; and (2) the Attorney General from constructing or acquiring any property or facilities in Maryland to be used as a detention center or Federal prison.

titles.title: To prohibit the Office of Federal Detention Trustee from constructing Federal detention centers and to prohibit the Department of Justice from siting a detention center or Federal prison in Maryland, and for other purposes.

To prohibit the Office of Federal Detention Trustee from constructing Federal detention centers and to prohibit the Department of Justice from siting a detention center or Federal prison in Maryland, and for other purposes.
